application.Audio

Class AudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Audio.AudioPlayer

  • public class AudioPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for the player actions such as: Pausing, playing, skipping, stopping, and rotating the track order one a track has finished.
    Author:
    Spud

      AudioPlayer() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void pause()
      Pauses the current track, or resumes it if it's already paused.
      static void play()
      Plays the current track in the queue.
      static void rotate()
      Rotates the track queue, and then tries to play what's next
      static void skip()
      Skips the current track.
      static void stop()
      Stops the player
